Articles.Content:
I'm pretty sure it's been mentioned before however I could not find threads about it so I just want to know the current opinion about this suggestion.

Can you accept missions in career mode in exchange for money?

Like:

Go to [X] in [Y] amount of months

conditions: [Z]

Reward: [A] amount of money

Ideal would be to have a mission generated based on the amount of money and progression of tech tree.

Opinions?

This discussion is in progress a few threads down.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/56453-Money-in-Career-Mode-Contracts-Office
